items.title: Chileans voted overwhelmingly to throw out the country's...
items.content_html:
Abolish ICE Denver

Chileans voted overwhelmingly to throw out the country's Pinochet-era constitution and form a new one. More than 7.5 million people voted, setting a new record for participation, officials said.

One year after Santiago's streets were jammed by protesters, they were filled Sunday with revelers. More than 7.5 million people voted, setting a new record for voter participation, officials said.

npr.org

Chile Celebrates Voters' Decision To Scrap Constitution, Start Over

One year after Santiago's streets were jammed by protesters, they were filled Sunday with revelers. More than 7.5 million people voted, setting a new record for voter participation, officials said.One year after Santiago's streets were jammed by protesters, they were filled Sunday with revelers. More than 7.5 million people voted, setting a new record for voter participation, officials said.

items.title: "Advocates with the Colorado People's Alliance, the...
items.content_html:
Abolish ICE Denver

"Advocates with the Colorado People's Alliance, the group that organized the press conference, are now pushing local ICE officials to continue releasing detainees on humanitarian parole.

Immigration attorneys have also pushed for bond hearings and, in some cases, filed lawsuits to get their clients out of the facility. Some of those lawsuits led to detainees being released, while others were dismissed by judges in the U.S. District Court of Colorado."

A total of 110 Aurora ICE detainees have tested positive.

westword.com

There's an Ongoing COVID Outbreak at the Aurora ICE Facility

items.title: Join us Friday, October 30 for a virtual protest against the...
items.content_html:
Abolish ICE Denver

Join us Friday, October 30 for a virtual protest against the scariest company on earth, Palantir Technologies! This horrifying corporation provides the technology that ICE uses to detain and deport immigrants and destroy families and communities. In August they had the audacity to relocate to Denver and are now spreading their evil-dead terror in our own state. The fear this company spreads is the REAL DEAL. It cannot be allowed to get away with it! We will hold a Halloween t...hemed virtual protest with live theatre and digital actions against Palantir to demonstrate the real monster this Halloween.

**Due to the rising rates of COVID in Colorado, we invite you to join our livestream virtually as we perform street theatre and take action digitally! More to come soon!**

**********

¬°√önase a nosotros el viernes 30 de octubre para una protesta virtual en la empresa m√°s aterradora del mundo, Palantir Technologies! Esta corporaci√≥n horrible proporciona la tecnolog√≠a que usa ICE para detener y deportar inmigrantes y destruir familias y comunidades. En agosto, tuvieron la audacia de trasladarse a Denver y ahora est√°n esparciendo su terror de muerte maligna en nuestro propio estado. El miedo que transmite esta empresa es el TRATO REAL. ¬°No se puede permitir que se salga con la suya! Realizaremos una protesta virtual tem√°tica de Halloween con teatro en vivo y acciones digitales contra Palantir para demostrar el monstruo real este Halloween.

**Debido a las crecientes tasas de COVID en Colorado, les invitamos a unirse a nuestra transmisi√≥n en vivo virtualmente mientras realizamos teatro callejero y actuamos digitalmente. ¬°M√°s por venir pronto!**

See More

FRI, OCT 30 AT 5:30 PM MDT

The Terror From Palantir: Halloween Virtual Protest Against The Scariest Company on Earth

items.title: Abolish ICE DenverAFSC & Coloradans For Immigrant Rights***Follows in English*** ALERTA DE ACCION: Brote de #COVID dentro del centro de...
items.content_html:
Abolish ICE DenverAFSC & Coloradans For Immigrant Rights

***Follows in English***
ALERTA DE ACCION: Brote de #COVID dentro del centro de detencion de GEO/ICE en Aurora (Sigue mas detalles) Por favor, tome acci√≥n! Haz ...dos llamadas hoy, comparte y entr√©nate para ser una voluntaria con la line de salvavidas.
- Llame a ICE y insiste que liberen a las personas con parole humanitaria inmediata 720-873-2899 y priete 1
- Llame al Director de GEO, Johnny Choate y insiste que el provee cuida medica apropiado a los que est√°n bajo su cuido 303-361-6612
- Se voluntario con la l√≠nea de salvavidas de COPA http://bit.ly/VolunteerLifeline
Tal vez ya han escuchado que hay un brote de COVID muy preocupante dentro del centro de detenci√≥n de GEO en Aurora, CO. En este momento aproximadamente 90 personas han salido positivos po COVID19 y por lo menos una persona ha sido hospitalizado.
Nuestros compa√±eros de la Alianza del Pueblo de Colorado (COPA) han compartido testimonios de las personas atrapados adentro. Aunque reporten las personas detenidas que GEO si est√° instituyendo cuarentenas, muchas √°reas principales del centro de detenci√≥n no est√°n siendo desinfectados. Escuche al testimonio completo de las personas luchando por sus vidas AQU√ç (https://youtu.be/zcrkC_agqDY). COPA ha lanzado una l√≠nea salvavidas para personas detenidas con el fin de respaldar a las personas adentro de GEO. Por favor comparte con los seres queridos de los detenidos y las personas detenidas.
*************************************************************
ACTION ALERT: COVID outbreak at GEO intensifies (more details below) Please Take Action! Make these 2 calls today. SHARE and volunteer to stand up with the people detained at the GEO Immigrant Detention Center.
‚Ä¢ Call ICE and demand the release of people on humanitarian parole 720-873-2899 and press 1
‚Ä¢ Call Warden Johnny Choate and demand that he provides proper medical care to those in need 303-361-6612
‚Ä¢ Sign up to be a volunteer for COPA‚Äôs detention lifeline http://bit.ly/VolunteerLifeline
As you may know, there is a concerning COVID 19 outbreak at the GEO Immigrant Detention Center right now. At this time, approximately 90 people have tested positive and at least one person has been hospitalized. The Colorado People's Alliance has shared testimony from people inside and while it seems that quarantines are happening, many areas of the Detention Center are not being disinfected. Listen to the full testimony here (https://youtu.be/zcrkC_agqDY). COPA has launched an incredible Detention Lifeline to support people at GEO, please share with families of loved ones or people who are detained.

#FreeThemAll #AbolishICE #defundHate
Colorado Immigrant Rights Coalition - CIRC Congresswoman Diana DeGette Rep. Jason Crow Senator Cory Gardner Senator Michael Bennet

See More

items.title: Abolish ICE DenverSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.Have you heard? Ingrid Encalada Latorre, the founder of...
items.content_html:
Abolish ICE DenverSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Have you heard? Ingrid Encalada Latorre, the founder of @no.mas.chuecos, is selling homemade chile relleno, chocoflan, and Peruvian masks this Saturday to raise... money for her legal case. Ingrid has been in sanctuary now for about four years as she fights her immigration case so that she can stay in the U.S. with her children. She received a pardon from @govofco last year, in large part for her work with @no.mas.chuecos, which seeks to educate immigrants about the dangers and consequences of uses false documents. You can support Ingrid as she fights to stay in the U.S. by purchasing food from her this weekend or by donating directly to her Venmo @/Ingrid-Encalada tinyurl.com/solidarity-meals-10-24.

See More

items.title: Join community tomorrow for a press conference with Chris' friends and family....
items.content_html:
Join community tomorrow for a press conference with Chris' friends and family.

A BLM protestor was ran over on their scooter this summer wearing a BLM mask in Denver and many in community feel that it's a major DPD coverup.

Chris was wearing a BLM mask, he tried to get his friends out of harms way and the driver redirected and targeted him, plowing into a group of black kids and killing Chris. All the kids are from out of town and coming back for the DPD press conference Tuesday

Tomorrow we expect police to say they found the car but no driver and DPD may even be closing the investigation b/c the car was supposedly reported stolen before the incident.

items.title: Via @coloradopeoplesalliance and the Detention Lifeline...
items.content_html:
Via @coloradopeoplesalliance and the Detention Lifeline

üö®Community Alertüö®
The Aurora Fire Chief notified council members of a COVID-19 outbreak at the GEO detention facility this afternoon. There are 19 confirmed positive cases! We know we can't count on GEO to keep our community members who are detained safe. We demand that GEO releases as many folks as possible on humanitarian parole and ensures that those who are sick receive the proper medical care! We will keep monitoring the situation and connect with folks inside the facility to ensure their health and safety.

Read our full press release here: https://coloradopeoplesalliance.ourpowerbase.net/civicrm/mailing/view?id=1271&reset=1

üö®Alerta a la comunidadüö®
El jefe de bomberos de Aurora notificó a los miembros del consejo sobre un brote de COVID-19 en el centro de detención de GEO en Aurora esta tarde. ¡Hay 19 casos positivos confirmados! Sabemos que no podemos contar con GEO para mantener seguros a los miembros de nuestra comunidad que están detenidos. Exigimos que GEO libere a la mayor cantidad posible de personas en libertad condicional humanitaria y garantice que los enfermos reciban la atención médica adecuada. Seguiremos al tanto de la situación y nos conectaremos con las personas dentro de las instalaciones para garantizar su salud y seguridad.

Lea nuestro comunicado de prensa completo aquí: https://coloradopeoplesalliance.ourpowerbase.net/civicrm/mailing/view?id=1271&reset=1

Palantir Technologies is ICE’s technology backbone, provides the digital infrastructure to surveil, detain and deport immigrants."

Photos by @buffalo_heart_images

items.title: Conditions are extremely difficult for our @denverpsl comrades inside.Lillian, Joel & Eliza are dealing with...
items.content_html: Conditions are extremely difficult for our @denverpsl comrades inside.Lillian, Joel & Eliza are dealing with difficulties accessing medication and sanitary products, serious COVID risks, abuse from guards, and intense stress from isolation (23+ hours a day). Their civil rights are also being violated with Denver, Adams and Arapahoe County working together to deny our comrades a bond hearing. Our comrades suffer yet they are still thinking of others — constantly telling communjty about the conditions of their cell mates and others in the jail and agitating for their release as well. @justiceforelijahmcclain PSL Denver and Say Their Names 5280 are heroes and freedom fighters. And we need to be fighting harder than ever for them. See you Saturday!

items.title: After the success of last year's "Confront la Migra Where They Live!" house demonstration in the suburban neighborhood...
items.content_html:
After the success of last year's "Confront la Migra Where They Live!" house demonstration in the suburban neighborhood of GEO Warden Johnny Choate, @auroragov and APD spent nearly a QUARTER OF A MILLION dollars to police the Enough Coalition march up Colfax to GEO in the following week. In a SINGLE DAY A quarter million dollars were paid out to APD and Adams County officers just to try to intimidate us with fences and riot gear. That day, APD also tried to make our indigenous comrades drop their prayer sticks to enter on Oakland Street and when our comrades told APD, "You're in riot gear and have batons! Let us have our prayer sticks or we are gonna sue the shit out of you!"

Why does APD continue to do private security for Aurora GEO? La policia, la migra, misma porqueria!

Photos by @denvercommunists

#AbolishICE #ChingaLaMigra #closethecamps

items.title: Date: Sunday, September 20th, 2020 from 1-3PM @ Aurora GEO 3130 Oakland St...
items.content_html:
Date: Sunday, September 20th, 2020 from 1-3PM @ Aurora GEO 3130 Oakland St

*Please adhere to 6ft social distancing - Wear your masks, bring your hand sanitizer.*

"We'll be highlighting the refugee and immigrant experience of our AAPI communities. We want to peacefully express our concerns about the new ICE Director appointment. Please join us in solidarity!

Asian refugee and immigrant speakers from Chinese, Vietnamese, And Korean backgrounds will provide their powerful stories and perspectives. Immigration advocates and activists will also provide updates on current issues surrounding immigration.

We invite you to sign postcards to express your support for ICE detainees that will be delivered to local legislators.

Please share this event and encourage others to show up and support!"

items.title: Message us for the event link! This series is every Tuesday in person or online until Sept 29!...
items.content_html:
Message us for the event link! This series is every Tuesday in person or online until Sept 29!

https://facebook.com/events/s/immigration-is-an-lgbtq-issue-/269755914013547/?ti=cl

Immigration is an LGBTQ Issue: Love Across Borders
TUESDAYS @ 6:30pm • Sept. 8, 15*, 22 & 29

(This event is NOT being held at the Althea Center.)

ONLINE via Zoom to Facebook Live
• Sept. 15*: Only available online on this date.
• Recordings of the series will be posted on YouTube.
OR
ON-SITE (Raíces Brewing, 2060 West Colfax Ave.)
• In-person reservations REQUIRED & limited to first 50 people.

Drinks & Pizza at Raíces Brewing Company starting @ 5:30PM (Reservations required for Raíces)

Zoom Program and live streaming @ 6:30PM

Entertainment produced by Black Actors Guild @ 7:30-8:00PM

Registration: FREE 4-week series!
Please register in advance.
Raíces reservation and program Zoom information emailed with RSVP confirmation.
Immigration Equality shoulder bag for the first 100 registrants.

https://www.altheacenter.org/loveacrossborders

Mariposa at the Althea Center, in partnership with NY-based Immigration Equality and American Friends Service Committee Colorado, will present “Immigration is an LGBTQ Issue: Love Across Borders,” 4-week series of programs highlighting some of the traumatizing circumstances and critical needs of our LGBTQ sisters and brothers seeking asylum in the United States.

With simultaneous Spanish/English interpretation provided for Zoom participants, we will hear powerful and personal migration stories from current and recent LGBTQ asylum seekers. PFLAG Las Cruces, NM, will share their “real life” model of hosting asylum seekers, for which they won an award last year from the national PFLAG organization. We will hear from national and local leaders doing the day-to-day work of assisting and supporting these asylum seekers.

Registration: FREE 4-week series!
Please register in advance.
Raíces reservation and program Zoom information emailed with RSVP confirmation.
Immigration Equality shoulder bag for the first 100 registrants.

https://www.altheacenter.org/loveacrossborders

items.title: Denver Police have killed again! And they won‚Äôt stop until we stop them! On Wednesday, Sept 9, they shot and killed...
items.content_html:
Denver Police have killed again! And they won’t stop until we stop them! On Wednesday, Sept 9, they shot and killed Antonio Blackbear, a 41-year-old Lakota man.

Antonio was the adopted cousin of another Lakota man killed by the Denver Police five years ago, Paul Castaway. Indigenous people are more likely than any other racial group to be killed by police.

There has been no semblance of justice for Paul in that time, since Denver District Attorneys, like their counterparts around the nation, refuse to hold police accountable for the violent, racist terror that forms the very core of their job description. We expect the fight for justice for Antonio to be a similarly difficult one.

The police have yet to release video of their killing of Antonio, nor say much about it, because they are working to craft a story that casts them in the best light.

Justice for Antonio Blackbear!
Defund, disarm, and disband the police!
